cause.description:
Monthly check sent to family to help defray daily living cost. Services are available nationwide.
1. We provide financial assistance monthly to children with cancer.
2. We do not fund any research.
3. We are the first organization to do this so please help us by donating!
cause.mission: The Children's Cancer Fund of America provides financial assistance to medically indigent families having a child with cancer.
cause.name: Childrens Cancer Fund of America, Inc.
